turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you please order me a drink from starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I sure can. Which starbucks location do you want your drink from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it from Marketstreet off Kell .

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good, what type of drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want the black and white mocha please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, and what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay is there anything else you want me to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add almond milk instead and I would like the whipped cream as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I have add that is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you see if they can add cinnamon to the top?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I can. Will that be all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that should be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay sounds good I will send over the receipt.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The black and white mocha will be ready in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your welcome I will have that order from market street ready for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Again thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Youre welcome.
